verses.text:
Then there was a \w famine|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H1245"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and for \add his\add* \w bloody|strong="H1818"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, because he \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* the \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*.  +  r 21.1  t enquired…: Heb. sought the face, etc *

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* the \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them; (now the \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w* \add were\add* not of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, but of the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*; and the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto them: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* to \w slay|strong="H5221"\w* them in his \w zeal|strong="H7065"\w* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.)

Wherefore \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*, What shall I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for you? and wherewith shall I make the \w atonement|strong="H3722"\w*, that ye may \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?

And the \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, We will have no \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* nor \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w of|strong="H5973"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, nor of his \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; neither for us shalt thou \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What ye shall \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add that\add* will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* for you.\f + \fr 21.4 \ft We will…: or, It is not silver nor gold that we have to do with Saul or his house, neither pertains it to us to kill, etc\f*

And they \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, The \w man|strong="H0376"\w* that \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* us, and that \w devised|strong="H1819"\w* against us \add that\add* we should be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* from \w remaining|strong="H3320"\w* in any of the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*,\f + \fr 21.5 \ft devised…: or, cut us off\f*

Let \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* be \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* unto us, and we will hang them \w up|strong="H3363"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \add whom\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* did \w choose|strong="H0972"\w*. And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add*.  +  r 21.6  t whom…: or, chosen of the \+nd LORD\+nd* *

But the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*, the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, because of the \nd \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* that \add was\add* between them, between \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

But the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Rizpah|strong="H7532"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Aiah|strong="H0345"\w*, whom she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w Armoni|strong="H0764"\w* and \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*; and the \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Michal|strong="H4324"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, whom she brought \w up|strong="H3205"\w* for \w Adriel|strong="H5741"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Barzillai|strong="H1271"\w* the \w Meholathite|strong="H4259"\w*:\f + \fr 21.8 \ft Michal: or, Michal’s sister\f*\f + \fr 21.8 \ft brought…: Heb. bear to Adriel\f*

And he \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* them into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w Gibeonites|strong="H1393"\w*, and they \w hanged|strong="H3363"\w* them in the \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and they \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \add all\add* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*, and were put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* in the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*, in the \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \add days\add*, in the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of \w barley|strong="H8184"\w* \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*.

¶ And \w Rizpah|strong="H7532"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Aiah|strong="H0345"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w*, and \w spread|strong="H5186"\w* it for her upon the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w*, from the \w beginning|strong="H8462"\w* of \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w* until \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w dropped|strong="H5413"\w* upon them out of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w suffered|strong="H5414"\w* neither the \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w* to \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* on them by \w day|strong="H3119"\w*, nor the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* what \w Rizpah|strong="H7532"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Aiah|strong="H0345"\w*, the \w concubine|strong="H6370"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, had \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* from the \w men|strong="H1167"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*, which had \w stolen|strong="H1589"\w* them from the \w street|strong="H7339"\w* of \w Beth-shan|strong="H1052"\w*, where the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w hanged|strong="H8511"\w* them, \w when|strong="H3117"\w* the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* in \w Gilboa|strong="H1533"\w*:

And he brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from thence the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; and they \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of them that were \w hanged|strong="H3363"\w*.

And the \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* they in the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w* in \w Zelah|strong="H6762"\w*, in the \w sepulchre|strong="H6913"\w* of \w Kish|strong="H7027"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*: and they \w performed|strong="H6213"\w* all that the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*. And \w after|strong="H0310"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w intreated|strong="H6279"\w* for the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

¶ Moreover the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* had yet \w war|strong="H4421"\w* again with \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* with him, and \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* waxed \w faint|strong="H5774"\w*.

And \w Ishbi-benob|strong="H3430"\w*, which \add was\add* of the \w sons|strong="H3211"\w* of the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w*, the \w weight|strong="H4948"\w* of whose \w spear|strong="H7013"\w* \add weighed\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \add shekels\add* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* in \w weight|strong="H4948"\w*, he being \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* with a \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \add sword\add*, \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* to have \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.\f + \fr 21.16 \ft the giant: or, Rapha\f*\f + \fr 21.16 \ft spear: Heb. the staff, or, the head\f*

But \w Abishai|strong="H0052"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* \w succoured|strong="H5826"\w* him, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Philistine|strong="H6430"\w*, and \w killed|strong="H4191"\w* him. Then the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thou shalt \w go|strong="H3318"\w* no more out with us to \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, that thou \w quench|strong="H3518"\w* not the \w light|strong="H5216"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.\f + \fr 21.17 \ft light: Heb. candle, or, lamp\f*

And it came to pass after \w this|strong="H0310"\w*, that there was again a \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* at \w Gob|strong="H1359"\w*: then \w Sibbechai|strong="H5444"\w* the \w Hushathite|strong="H2843"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \w Saph|strong="H5593"\w*, which \add was\add* of the \w sons|strong="H3211"\w* of the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w*.\f + \fr 21.18 \ft the giant: or, Rapha\f*\f + \fr 21.18 \ft Saph: or, Sippai\f*

And there was again a \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in \w Gob|strong="H1359"\w* with the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, where \w Elhanan|strong="H0445"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jaare-oregim|strong="H3296"\w*, a \w Beth-lehemite|strong="H1022"\w*, \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* \add the brother of\add* \w Goliath|strong="H1555"\w* the \w Gittite|strong="H1663"\w*, the \w staff|strong="H6086"\w* of whose \w spear|strong="H2595"\w* \add was\add* like a \w weaver’s|strong="H0707"\w* \w beam|strong="H4500"\w*.\f + \fr 21.19 \ft Jaare-oregim: or, Jair\f*

And there was yet a \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* in \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, where was a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of \add great\add* \w stature|strong="H4067"\w*, that had on every \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w*, and on every \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w toes|strong="H0676"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* in \w number|strong="H4557"\w*; and he also was \w born|strong="H3205"\w* to the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w*.\f + \fr 21.20 \ft the giant: or, Rapha\f*

And when he \w defied|strong="H2778"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Jonathan|strong="H3083"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shimea|strong="H8092"\w* the \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* him.\f + \fr 21.21 \ft defied: or, reproached\f*\f + \fr 21.21 \ft Shimea: also called, Shammah\f*

These \w four|strong="H0702"\w* were \w born|strong="H3205"\w* to the \w giant|strong="H7497"\w* in \w Gath|strong="H1661"\w*, and \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.
